segments.text: Mrs . Reynolds ? This is Martin Gross calling .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Hi , Martin . What can I do for you ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well , I ’ Ve got the spread sheets you asked for , but I ’ m still waiting on some data from accounting .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That ’ s all right . Bring me over what you ’ Ve got .
segments.speaker: S2
